Article Title: Online money games used to fund terror, govt tells SC
Article Text:
Representative image

Your Money Vanished? The Truth About Online Scams & How To Fight Back!

NEW DELHI: Justifying its decision to ban online money games by bringing Promotion and Regulation of Online Gaming Act, Centre on Tuesday told Supreme Court that the unregulated online gaming sector had links with terror financing and money laundering, but said it was premature to examine validity of the law as it had not yet been notified after President's assent.In an affidavit filed in court on a batch of petitions challenging validity of the law, the Centre told the court that the Act was meant to protect individuals, especially youth and vulnerable populations, from the adverse social, economic, psychological and privacy related impacts of online money games and to safeguard the integrity of financial systems and security and sovereignty of the country."Unchecked expansion of online money gaming has been linked to financial fraud, money laundering, tax evasion, and in some cases, the financing of terrorism, thereby posing threats to national security, public order and integrity of the state... There is enough material and data that indicates the unregulated online gaming sector has links with terror financing and money laundering, yet again establishing the exclusive compete-nce of Parliament to regulate the same," the affidavit said.It said data pertaining to money laundering and terror financing links to online money games were classified but agreed to place the same in SC in a sealed cover. "An analysis of data from Suspicious Transaction Reports and Cross Border Wire Tra-nsfer Reports revealed online gaming companies registered in small island countries where user accounts were registered with Indian banks in the name of proxy persons. The money collected from the users has been remitted out of India by misdeclaring purposes of remittances," the affidavit said.
Article Summary: The centre told supreme court that the unregulated online gaming sector had links with terror financing and money laundering. It said it was premature to examine validity of the law as it had not yet been notified after president's assent. The centre told the court that the act was meant to protect individuals, especially youth and vulnerable populations.

Article Title: Stefon Diggs‚Äô partner Cardi B makes a bold statement after childbirth by transforming her baby‚Äôs umbilical cord into a gold pendant
Article Text:
(Image via Instagram: Cardi B with her baby boy)

Cardi B Debuts Newborn Son in Patriots Gear as She and Stefon Diggs Melt the Internet

Stefon Diggs‚Äô girlfriend Cardi B commemorates fourth baby‚Äôs birth with unique heart-shaped gold jewelry

Cardi B Turns Her Umbilical Cord Into GOLD!

More coverage on Cardi B and Stefon Diggs:

The placenta forms an extraordinary bond between mother and child, with the umbilical cord as their lifeline of silent conversation. When the baby arrives, the placenta follows, marking the end of this quiet connection. For nine months, mother and baby shared unspoken messages through this remarkable link, only to part with it at birth. But what if that connection could last a lifetime? That is probably the vision behind Mommy Made Encapsulation, a service that allows mothers to preserve their placenta forever. Such preservation was chosen by Cardi B , partner of New England Patriots wide receiver Stefon Diggs The couple recently welcomed a baby boy into their lives. Following the heartfelt tradition, she began with her third child, daughter Blossom, in October 2024, the Grammy-winning rapper chose to honor her fourth child with Diggs in November 2025 in a similar way. She entrusted Mommy Made Encapsulation to transform her pregnancy journey into cherished keepsakes, capturing the memorable moments when her baby was still growing inside her. The company crafted a heart-shaped gold pendant from the baby‚Äôs umbilical cord and turned the placenta into nourishing vitamins to support her post-partum recovery.Curious about how the gold pendant comes to life? The process begins with careful cleaning of the placenta, followed by a wash with blue dye that highlights its unique texture.After another rinse, the technician gently separates the placenta from the umbilical cord. The cord, now a striking blue, is shaped around a heart-shaped metal ring, with any extra length trimmed away. Finally, the piece is dipped in shimmering gold chrome, transforming it into a gleaming keepsake. The company describes it as a way to honor the first bond between mother and child. According to the company‚Äôs website, ‚ÄúThe umbilical cord keepsake is your baby‚Äôs umbilical cord dehydrated in the shape of a heart and then dipped in gold chrome. The end result looks and feels like metal and is the perfect way to honor the first connection you shared with your baby.‚Äù It costs $50.The ‚ÄúAM I THE DRAMA?‚Äù creator took things a step further by having her placenta turned into vitamin capsules. That‚Äôs not all. She also tried something called a Placenta Print. The process starts with cleaning the placenta and dyeing it blue to look like a tree. Then, a sheet of paper is pressed on top to make the company‚Äôs signature Placenta Print, which costs $65. Their website explains that the print is made by painting the placenta with food-grade coloring (one gets to choose the colors) and stamping it onto a 12-by-18-inch poster to create a Tree of Life painting. After the print is made, the placenta receives a fresh rinse before its transformation into capsules begins. Lemon juice, cayenne pepper, and ginger are added to the raw placenta.The website explains that the Traditional Chinese Medicine (TCM) method is used, with careful steaming at 220 degrees F for 30 minutes to ensure safety. Bacteria and viruses cannot survive at temperatures higher than 131 degrees F. The placenta is gently steamed in specially designed steaming bags made up of heat-resistant, FDA-approved nylon, safe for cooking and free of BPA. Once steamed, the placenta is dried, ground into a fine powder, and sealed into capsules.Each placenta yields 160-180 pills, which, when taken regularly, can offer many benefits for new mothers, such as increased energy levels, reduced post-natal bleeding, lesser chance of baby blues, balanced mood and hormone levels, increased milk supply, lesser chance of post-partum depression, higher iron levels, uterus returning back to pre-pregnancy size faster, losing baby weight faster, and enhanced bonding experience with the baby.The capsules are available in a variety of flavors, including strawberry, orange, bubblegum, lime, berry, grape, and a vegan option. According to the website, these capsules never expire. They just need to be kept at room temperature and in a dry place. The pills can be taken with other medications. The cost of encapsulation starts at $500. This never-heard-before ritual has even captured the curiosity of stars like Megan Fox and Vanessa Hudgens , who, like Cardi B, have embraced the trend of creating placenta keepsakes.Mommy Made Encapsulation was founded by mother-of-four Juliane Corona in 2016. Juliane and her team have encapsulated for over 40,000 moms, including celebrity clients such as Brittany Nassif, Jacqie Rivera, Leslie Hernandez, Adizia Benzon, Andrea Espada, Brittani Boren, and more.
Article Summary: The grammy-winning rapper entrusted mommy made encapsulation to transform her pregnancy journey into cherished keepsakes. The company crafted a heart-shaped gold pendant from the baby‚Äôs umbilical cord and turned the placenta into nourishing vitamins to support her post-partum recovery.

Article Title: MLB trade rumor: Kyle Gibson hints at surprising Nick Castellanos trade fit with a $2.55B NL Central club after Phillies cut his playing time
Article Text:
(Image Source - Getty Images)

Kyle Gibson backs Nick Castellanos as a trade target for the St. Louis Cardinals during offseason

Nick Castellanos has become the hot topic in trade discussions after a tough season with the Phillies. He faced challenges at the plate, had issues in the outfield, and allegedly had disagreements with manager Rob Thomson. Then, Kyle Gibson, a seasoned pitcher for the Cardinals, threw out a daring idea on a podcast. He mentioned that the Cardinals might want to think about trading for Castellanos.Gibson highlighted that Castellanos offers leadership, experience, and a strong winning mentality, traits that would benefit the Cardinals' young lineup. The team is valued at $2.55 billion and can accommodate his $20 million salary, making this trade feasible. With the Phillies‚Äô outfield getting crowded and Castellanos‚Äô role diminishing, this deal could be advantageous for both sides. Gibson‚Äôs remarks transformed a rumor into a narrative that works for all parties involved.Gibson, who was an All-Star in 2017, joined the Cardinals on a one-year, $13 million contract before the 2025 season. He knows Castellanos pretty well from their battles in the NL East when he was with the Phillies and Nationals.During the November 24 episode of "Cardinal Territory," a podcast that focuses on the Cardinals and is hosted by local media personalities, Gibson didn‚Äôt shy away from sharing his views on offseason targets."I think a trade for Nick Castellanos could be an interesting one for the Cardinals," Gibson said directly to the hosts. "You get a right-handed outfield DH bat, that could be interesting. Knowing Nick, how he is in the clubhouse as a veteran, I think could be good. (He has a) Really, really want-to-win type personality, and I know that maybe that's not the year the Cardinals could find themselves in, but I think it could be an interesting move. "The clip quickly went viral, shared by the @CardTerritory X account with the caption: "‚ÄúKnowing Nick [Castellanos] and how he is in the clubhouse as a veteran... Kyle Gibson explains why Nick Castellanos could be an intriguing trade target for the Cardinals." Gibson highlighted the less tangible aspects, such as Castellanos' leadership and motivation‚Äîtraits that the former Rangers World Series champ (2023) thinks could help stabilize a young St. Louis team‚Äîrather than just focusing on the numbers.This isn't Gibson's first dive into trade discussions; being a 15-year MLB veteran, he's pretty open about how players fit into the roster. His remarks match up with the wider buzz, as MLB Trade Rumors placed Castellanos at No. 33 on their top 40 trade candidates list for the 2025-26 offseason, pointing out Philadelphia's crowded outfield and his contract coming to an end.Also Read: MLB trade rumor: Los Angeles Dodgers eye Emilio Pag√°n to fix bullpen issues after relying on Yoshinobu Yamamoto to close Game 7
Article Summary: Nick castellanos has become the hot topic in trade discussions after a tough season with the phillies. Kyle gibson, a seasoned pitcher for the cardinals, threw out a daring idea on a podcast. He mentioned that the cardinals might want to think about trading for castellano.

Article Title: What is Mat Ishbia's net worth? Billionaire faces explosive allegations in shocking Phoenix Suns ownership scandal
Article Text:
Mat Ishbia is currently in hot water (Image via Getty Images)

Ishbia is a famous personality and according to a May 2024 Forbes estimate, his net worth is roughly $10.1 billion.

Fresh allegations deepen turmoil inside Mat Ishbia‚Äôs Phoenix Suns empire

Mat Ishbia, the owner of the Phoenix Suns, recently got into trouble. He reportedly made the news after two minority owners, Scott Seldin and Andy Kohlberg, filed a complaint against Ishbia. He was charged with financial manipulation, self-dealing, and fraud within the NBA team, according to a story published by the prominent media outlet The Athletic.In addition to being the chairman and CEO of United Wholesale Mortgage (UWM), he owns the Phoenix Suns and Mercury basketball teams.Another round of legal action within the Phoenix Suns ownership group apparently began on Monday when two minority owners filed an explosive complaint. It accused majority owner Mat Ishbia of fraud, self-dealing, and manipulating team finances for his own gain.Ishbia allegedly used the team as his "personal piggy bank," according to Front Office Sports. The Suns swiftly denounced this as "a shameless shakedown dressed up as legal process." The latest filing stated, via ESPN:"Ishbia does not own the Suns to make money for the company but he does operate it as a personal fiefdom for his own personal gain and for the benefit of his other businesses, including his mortgage company United Wholesale Mortgage...The reality is that Ishbia is using the Suns as his personal piggy bank, including through a lengthy list of conflicted transactions‚Äîonly some of which the minority owners are aware of. "The June 2 capital call, which is a regular obligation for ownership groups to contribute funds, is at the heart of the issue, according to the document. Scott Seldin and Andy Kohlberg, the minority owners, claim that Ishbia failed to meet the deadline he set and then made a covert attempt to conceal the failure from the other members of the ownership group.Additionally, the lawyers of the other two owners claimed in a statement to ESPN:‚Äú[Ishbia] has repeatedly abused his position as manager of the franchise to benefit himself‚Äînot the Suns.. We look forward to moving forward on an expedited basis and presenting our case to the court."Ishiba has been under investigation because it was alleged that he concealed his spending information from Scott Seldin and Andy Kolhberg, the co-owners. Ishbia and his source of income is now facing questions.Mat Ishbia amassed his wealth by expanding his father's business, United Wholesale Mortgage. Through rapid expansion, cutting-edge technology, and a policy prohibiting brokers from collaborating with specific rivals, UWM emerged as the biggest mortgage lender in the country.In 2023, Ishbia acquired a majority stake in the Phoenix Suns. After an investigation by ESPN's Baxter Holmes revealed claims of racism and misogyny within the organization, he bought the team from Robert Sarver, the previous owner. Nevertheless, Ishbia or his representatives are yet to comment on the whole thing.Also read: Phoenix Suns vs Portland Trail Blazers (11-18-2025) game preview: When and where to watch, expected lineup, injury report, prediction, and more
Article Summary: Mat ishbia, the owner of the phoenix suns, recently got into trouble. Two minority owners, scott seldin and andy kohlberg, filed a complaint against ishbia. He was charged with financial manipulation, self-dealing, and fraud within the nba team.

Article Title: Who is Mizkif's new girlfriend? Fans left in splits after streamer's latest gender reveal joke
Article Text:
Matthew ‚ÄúMizkif‚Äù (via Getty Images)

Fans react with confusion as Mizkif says ‚ÄúI‚Äôm gay‚Äù in playful reveal of his girlfriend Juice







Twitch streamer Matthew ‚ÄúMizkif‚Äù has recently surprised fans as he announced that he is in a relationship. He uploaded a reel titled Meet My Girlfriend Juice, where he revealed that he has not been livestreaming because he has been spending time with someone special. The former OTK member said he wanted to be open with the community instead of hiding his personal life. He then introduced his girlfriend, who goes by the name ‚ÄúJuice,‚Äù and shared a light-hearted moment when she appeared in the video and greeted viewers.In the Reel, Mizkif revealed that he has a girlfriend and wanted his followers to meet her. The update quickly went viral online. Many fans were left confused and wondered if the announcement was real or just another one of Mizkif‚Äôs jokes.In the Instagram Reel, Mizkif explained his recent absence from the platform.In the video, he said, ‚ÄúYo. I want to make this video to show you guys why I haven‚Äôt been streaming and why I haven‚Äôt been live lately. I have actually got a girlfriend, and I don‚Äôt want to hide her from you, so I‚Äôd rather show you guys who she is. So, yeah, I‚Äôm going to show you, and show who she is today. Her name is Juice. Juice. (A woman enters the frame and says, ‚ÄòHey, guys.‚Äô)I‚Äôm gay.‚ÄùThe playful ending fueled confusion across social media as fans reacted to the streamer‚Äôs latest update.One user wrote, ‚Äúpaid actress‚Äù Another user commented, ‚Äúgood way to try to uncancel urself but even if this works this sad attempt to seem like this is why u were taking a break not the not wanting to respond to the truth but hey if this somehow works for you i gotta respect it cause the internet truly is stupid‚Äù.Other users echoed the uncertainty and wrote, ‚ÄúShe's georgous. Congrats and I hope this one doesn't ruin your mental (bar is low with your ex)‚Äù, ‚ÄúI can‚Äôt tell if this is real or not‚Äù, ‚Äúim just trying to figure out if its a meme or not‚Äù and ‚Äúhe really thought he cooked with this one‚Äù.Earlier this month, on November 14, he also posted a ‚Äúget ready with me for court‚Äù Instagram update, continuing a pattern of dramatic social media reveals.Also Read: Keenyah Hill threatens to sue Plaqueboymax after viral IRL stream encounter, model claims streamer ignored her request
Article Summary: Twitch streamer matthew "mizkif" has recently surprised fans as he announced that he is in a relationship. He uploaded a reel titled meet my girlfriend juice, where he revealed that he has not been livestreaming because he has been spending time with someone special. The update quickly went viral online.

Article Title: Salesforce CEO Mark Benioff says he's never going to use ChatGPT again: It feels like ...
Article Text:
OpenAI's Master Plan for India

Tech leaders acknowledge Gemini 3.0 success









Salesforce CEO Mark Benioff has declared that he will not use ChatGPT, the AI chatbot developed by Microsoft-backed AI company OpenAI . His comments came after he used Google‚Äôs latest AI model, Gemini 3.0, stating that a two-hour experience with Google‚Äôs new model has convinced him to switch permanently. Google CEO Sundar Pichai termed the Gemini 3 as the company‚Äôs ‚Äúmost intelligent model, that combines all of Gemini‚Äôs capabilities together so you can bring any idea to life. ‚ÄùIn a post on X, Benioff claimed that Gemini 3.0 has brought a monumental shift in the AI landscape. The CEO specifically praised Gemini 3‚Äôs performance across multiple modalities, noting key improvements in reasoning, speed, image quality, and video processing as the compelling factors behind his decision.‚ÄúHoly shit. I‚Äôve used ChatGPT every day for 3 years. Just spent 2 hours on Gemini 3. I‚Äôm not going back. The leap is insane ‚Äî reasoning, speed, images, video‚Ä¶ everything is sharper and faster. It feels like the world just changed, again. ‚ù§Ô∏è ü§ñ‚ÄùBenioff‚Äôs endorsement highlights the competitive pressure now facing OpenAI as models from rival tech giants like Google make significant advances. Tesla CEO Elon Musk and even OpenAI chief executive Sam Altman praised Pichai following the launch of Gemini 3.The xAI founder said ‚ÄúCongrats‚Äù on Pichai‚Äôs "Geminiii" announcement on X, and ‚ÄúNice Work‚Äù to Demis Hassabis, the chief of DeepMind. Altman posted ‚ÄúCongrats to Google on Gemini 3! Looks like a great model.‚ÄùAltman even noted potential ‚Äútemporary economic headwinds‚Äù in an internal memo but expressed confidence in OpenAl‚Äôs rapid progress and leadership in the Al race.‚ÄúWe have built enough strength as a company to weather great models shipping elsewhere competition... (so), having most of our research team focused on really getting to superintelligence is critically important,‚Äù Altman wrote in the internal memo.
Article Summary: Salesforce ceo mark benioff has declared that he will not use chatgpt, the ai chatbot developed by microsoft-backed ai company openai. His comments came after he used google‚Äôs latest ai model, gemini 3.0, stating that a two-hour experience with the model has convinced him to switch permanently.

Article Title: How to restore old photos with Google Nano Banana Pro: A prompt guide and expert tips
Article Text:
Why Google Nano Banana Pro is ideal for restoring old photos

Google‚Äôs New AI Is BANANAS: How To Use Gemini Nano Banana

How to use Google Nano Banana Pro to restore old photos with the right prompts

General restoration prompt:

Portrait restoration prompt:

Colour correction prompt:

Severely damaged photo prompt:

Tips to restore old photos with Google Nano Banana Pro without losing authenticity

Avoid over-enhancing

Check historical colour references

Preserve original shadows

Inspect edges and background details

Common mistakes when restoring old photos with Google Nano Banana Pro

Also read|





There is something magical about rediscovering an old, worn photograph. The soft yellows, the creases, the fading edges and the stubborn scratches hold stories that feel too precious to lose. Until recently, restoring these photos required hours of painstaking manual editing. Now Google Nano Banana Pro has made that process far easier. With the right prompts and a bit of creative direction, you can revive portraits, repair damage, and bring lost details back to life in a way that looks natural and polished. Whether you are working with a family album or a treasured vintage snapshot, this tool gives you professional level results with far less effort.Google Nano Banana Pro uses advanced diffusion modelling and context-aware reconstruction. In simple terms, it analyses each pixel, predicts missing details and rebuilds textures so the restored image looks authentic rather than overly sharpened. It also understands lighting, skin tones, shadows and colour balance, which makes it one of the most reliable tools for repairing vintage portraits. Instead of plastic-looking edits, you get subtle, human-like restoration that respects the original photo.The model also handles very damaged images. Torn edges, fold marks, grainy patches and faded backgrounds can be reconstructed automatically. For photos from the 70s and 80s, which often have tinted colour casts, the tool balances hues without making the image look artificial.Using this model effectively comes down to guiding it with clear prompts. Here are prompt structures that work well for damaged or faded photos:‚ÄúRestore this old photograph with natural colours, clean details and accurate lighting. Remove scratches, stains and noise while keeping the original style.‚Äù‚ÄúReconstruct the face gently, retain natural skin texture, preserve original expressions and repair damaged areas without over-smoothing.‚Äù‚ÄúNeutralise yellow tint, improve contrast, balance highlights and shadows, and restore film-like tones.‚Äù‚ÄúRebuild missing or torn sections, reconstruct textures, recover facial features accurately and maintain the vintage feel of the image.‚ÄùYou can also add extra artistic instructions such as ‚Äúkeep grain minimal‚Äù or ‚Äúretain film quality‚Äù. The more specific you are, the more consistent the results.To ensure your restored photos look natural, keep these expert guidelines in mind:It is tempting to eliminate all grain, but older photographs naturally have texture. Leave a little grain to maintain the vintage character.For very old family photographs, match the restored colours with reference images from that era. For example, mid-century colour palettes often used softer reds and muted greens.Shadows anchor a photograph. If you remove too many shadows or highlights, the restored image may look flat. Let the model repair damage, but keep the original lighting structure intact.While the model handles most reconstruction automatically, sometimes background objects can appear too clean. Adjusting the prompt to ‚Äúpreserve background imperfections‚Äù can solve this.Many beginners make the error of giving vague prompts like ‚Äúfix this photo‚Äù. This causes incorrect smoothing, unnatural facial features or oddly bright colours. Another mistake is using portrait prompts for landscape images, which can distort objects. Over-sharpening is also common, resulting in a digital rather than vintage look. Always compare the original and restored versions side by side to ensure the emotional tone remains the same. This helps you refine edits, preserve important details, and maintain the original atmosphere that gives the photograph its distinctive authenticity.Photo restoration is more than fixing pixels. It is a way of honouring memories that might otherwise fade. With Google Nano Banana Pro and the right prompt strategy, you can bring old pictures back to life while preserving their history and charm. A few careful edits and a well-structured prompt are often all it takes to rebuild details, refresh colours and revive treasured moments. If you have a box of old photographs waiting to be restored, this tool is a gentle and precise way to begin.
Article Summary: Google nano banana pro uses advanced diffusion modelling and context-aware reconstruction. It analyses each pixel, predicts missing details and rebuilds textures so the restored image looks authentic rather than overly sharpened. For photos from the 70s and 80s, which often have tinted colour casts, the tool balances hues without making the image look artificial.

Article Title: JPMorgan CEO Jamie Dimon calls Nvidia an 'unbelievable‚Äô company, but warns some people will ‚Ä¶
Article Text:
AI is real and not a passing trend

Nvidia‚Äôs historic milestone



JPMorgan Chase CEO Jamie Dimon doesn‚Äôt sugarcoat AI impact on jobs





JPMorgan Chase CEO Jamie Dimon has now hailed Nvidia as an unbelievable company and has also cautioned investors that some artificial intelligence stocks may be trading at an unsustainable levels. Speaking with CNN‚Äôs Erin Burnett, Dimon said that the US remains the ‚Äòmost prosperous‚Äô economy in the world. He adds that the US economy is supported by diverse and deep capital markets including venture capital, private credit and hedge funds. ‚ÄúThere‚Äôs no question some people will lose money,‚Äù Dimon said, drawing parallels to the dot-com era. ‚ÄúBut mankind should benefit,‚Äù he added, emphasising that the underlying technology is real and transformative‚Äîeven if valuations are currently inflated.Dimon emphasized that AI is a genuine productivity revolution, comparing its current stage to the early days of the Internet. ‚ÄúIt‚Äôs almost at the beginning,‚Äù he said, noting that while not every company will succeed, AI will produce transformative winners just as the internet gave rise to Google, Facebook, and Amazon.Dimon acknowledged that valuations in the AI sector may be inflated, but stressed that the underlying technology will reshape industries and improve lives.‚ÄúMankind should benefit,‚Äù he said, even if ‚Äúvaluations today may be too high for some of these folks.‚ÄùIn October 2025, Nvidia became the first company in history to surpass a $5 trillion market valuation. Its market cap currently stands at $4.74 trillion, underscoring its dominance in the AI chip market. Dimon‚Äôs remarks came shortly after Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang predicted that China will win the AI race, a claim that drew sharp pushback from President Donald Trump, who vowed the U.S. would not allow other nations access to Nvidia‚Äôs most advanced chips.In another interview with Bloomberg TV, Dimon talked about the impact of AI on the job market. ‚ÄúPeople shouldn‚Äôt put their head in the sand. It is going to affect jobs,‚Äù he said. ‚ÄúAI will enhance some aspects of work, but also eliminate some jobs.‚Äù However, Dimon also stressed on the fact that JPMorgan is focused on retaining and redeploying employees whose roles are impacted by automation. ‚ÄúWe‚Äôll have more jobs, but there‚Äôll probably be less jobs in certain functions,‚Äù Dimon added. ‚ÄúYou‚Äôre better off being way ahead of the curve,‚Äù Dimon added.Dimon also added that the bank has invested about $2 billion as an annual investment in AI and is already making $2 billion in direct benefits. This includes the headcount reductions and operational savings. ‚ÄúWe know about $2 billion of actual cost saves,‚Äù he said. ‚ÄúIt‚Äôs the tip of the iceberg.‚Äù
Article Summary: Jpmorgan chase ceo jamie dimon has hailed nvidia as an unbelievable company. He has also cautioned investors that some artificial intelligence stocks may be trading at an unsustainable levels. Dimon emphasized that ai is a genuine productivity revolution, comparing its current stage to the early days of the internet.

Article Title: Warren Buffett‚Äôs $4.3 billion Alphabet investment signals a direct challenge to Nvidia‚Äôs lead in AI chips
Article Text:
Google‚Äôs AI chips may be shifting the balance of power

Nvidia Makes History: First Company to Hit $4 Trillion Market Cap

A shifting competitive dynamic, but not a dethroning

Google trains and serves Gemini models on TPU infrastructure.

Google Cloud is offering Ironwood TPUs to customers as part of its cloud platform.

Companies such as Anthropic have announced plans to use up to one million Google TPUs, citing performance and cost considerations.

What Buffett‚Äôs investment likely signals

Implications for the AI chip race





When Berkshire Hathaway revealed a new multibillion-dollar stake in Alphabet, most observers initially viewed it as another major addition to Warren Buffett‚Äôs long-term portfolio. Yet the timing and strategic context suggest the investment could be more than a routine allocation. The world‚Äôs most influential value investor has chosen to back Alphabet at a moment when the company is strengthening its control over the hardware that underpins advanced AI systems.For nearly a decade, Alphabet has been developing its own artificial intelligence chips, known as Tensor Processing Units (TPUs). In November 2025, the company announced general availability of its seventh-generation Ironwood TPU, describing it as designed for demanding AI workloads, including large-scale model training and high-volume inference. This announcement was made publicly on Google Cloud‚Äôs official blog, where the company highlighted lower costs and improved performance for AI developers.Most AI labs still rely heavily on Nvidia‚Äôs high-performance GPUs.These GPUs remain the industry‚Äôs gold standard, but they are extremely expensive and often in short supply. This has created bottlenecks for AI companies that depend entirely on Nvidia for compute capacity.Google is in a unique position. By designing its own chips, running its own data centres and integrating its hardware into products such as Gemini and Google Cloud, Alphabet gains levels of efficiency that many competitors cannot match without years of hardware investment. Analysts and industry researchers have suggested that TPU-based training may offer meaningful cost advantages compared to traditional GPU-heavy infrastructure, although exact ratios vary and are not always publicly disclosed.Buffett‚Äôs investment therefore can be understood not as a claim that Alphabet has overtaken Nvidia, but as confidence in Alphabet‚Äôs vertically integrated approach to AI. By controlling more of the stack, Alphabet potentially insulates itself from the price swings, supply constraints and dependence that characterise the GPU market.Nvidia remains the clear leader in AI chips and maintains a robust ecosystem of developers, tools and software support. Google‚Äôs TPUs represent a serious alternative in some workloads, but not a full replacement for GPUs across all use cases.The publicly available evidence shows:These developments suggest that the AI compute market may become more competitive. However, they do not confirm that Nvidia‚Äôs dominance is definitively weakened. Instead, they indicate that Alphabet is emerging as a strong hardware contender in a market previously dominated by a single supplier.Berkshire Hathaway‚Äôs disclosed stake in Alphabet was valued at approximately US$4.3 billion at the time of the filing. The filing does not state Berkshire‚Äôs motives. However, investors and analysts widely agree that Buffett‚Äôs approval of such a large position indicates confidence in Alphabet‚Äôs long-term strategy, including its growing emphasis on efficient AI infrastructure.Buffett has consistently favoured companies with durable advantages or ‚Äúmoats.‚Äù Alphabet‚Äôs traditional moats have included Search, YouTube and Android. In the AI era, Google‚Äôs control over its own chip design and cloud hardware may represent an additional moat that differentiates it from rivals.This does not imply that Google is attempting to dismantle Nvidia‚Äôs leadership. Instead, it suggests that Alphabet is building the capability to operate more independently in an AI-driven future, and that this capability may strengthen its competitiveness in cloud computing and AI services.The next phase of AI is likely to be shaped by which companies can train and deploy models most efficiently. If Google Cloud attracts more third-party training due to cost, performance and availability, it could gradually shift cloud market dynamics. Nvidia will remain central to the ecosystem, but Google‚Äôs TPU ecosystem adds a new dimension to the competition.Buffett‚Äôs investment amplifies the narrative that companies with deeper control over hardware, software and data will hold significant advantages in the years ahead. Alphabet is signalling that it intends to be such a company.The takeaway is clear: this is not the end of Nvidia‚Äôs dominance, but it may be the beginning of a more competitive era in AI hardware.
Article Summary: Berkshire hathaway revealed a new multibillion-dollar stake in alphabet. The timing and strategic context suggest the investment could be more than a routine allocation. The world‚Äôs most influential value investor has chosen to back alphabet at a moment when the company is strengthening its control over the hardware that underpins advanced ai systems.

Article Title: Apple CEO Tim Cook may not be retiring soon, here‚Äôs why
Article Text:
Apple CEO Tim Cook Confirms Majority Of iPhones Sold In U.S. Now Made In India

Tim Cook to reportedly retire in 2026

Tim Cook‚Äôs continued leadership

What‚Äôs next for Apple‚Äôs executive team





Apple CEO Tim Cook may not be retiring anytime soon. Earlier this month, a report by Financial Times revealed that Tim Cook is planning to step down as soon as next year. However, a new report by Bloomberg‚Äôs Mark Gurman suggests that Cook has no plans of stepping down in the near future. Apple has been preparing for a leadership transition for quite some time. In 2024, Bloomberg revealed that Apple‚Äôs senior vice president of hardware engineering John Ternus was at the center of succession discussions. Ternus the youngest member of Apple‚Äôs executive team looks after the hardware division and is also widely respected by Apple CEO Tim Cook and former COO Jeff Williams.Then in October this year, Bloomberg suggests that the internal spotlight on Ternus was ‚Äòintensifying‚Äô, making him the likely candidate to succeed Cook.Earlier this month, a report by Financial Times revealed that Apple CEO Tim Cook may step down from his position in between January and June 2026. As per the report, the current CEO Tim Cook is said to be succeeded by John Ternus, Apple‚Äôs senior vice-president of hardware engineering. However, no final decision has been made, sources told the publication. They also stressed that the transition plans are not tied to Apple‚Äôs current performance, as the company heads into what is expected to be a strong holiday season for iPhone sales.Taking about this upcoming transition, Bloomberg‚Äôs Mark Gurman wrote, ‚ÄúBased on everything I‚Äôve learned in recent weeks, I don‚Äôt believe a departure by the middle of next year is likely.‚Äù This means there are less chances of Tim Cook retiring anytime soon.Cook, who turned 65 this month, took over as CEO in 2011 after co-founder Steve Jobs died. Under his leadership, Apple‚Äôs valuation has climbed from around $350 billion to $4 trillion. Despite strong results last month, Apple‚Äôs roughly 12% stock rise this year trails rivals like Alphabet, Nvidia and Microsoft, which have surged on AI momentum.‚ÄúYes, Apple will eventually have a new leader. And, yes, it‚Äôs probably Ternus. But unless there is some unexpected event that forces Cook to step down sooner than planned, that moment is not at hand. But there still may be significant movement on Apple‚Äôs executive team. As I recently reported, silicon chief Johny Srouji is seriously evaluating his future at the company, while Apple has been on the hunt for a new AI leader,‚Äù said Bloomberg‚Äôs Mark Gurman.While the retirement of Apple CEO Tim Cook is not imminent, Bloomberg reveals that the company will still witness some leadership changes in the coming weeks. As per the report,Apple‚Äôs silicon chief, Johny Srouji may be evaluating his future at the company. Also, Apple is actively looking for a new AI leader in order to strengthen its position in generative AI sector.
Article Summary: Earlier this month, a report by financial times revealed that tim cook is planning to step down as soon as next year. However, a new report by bloomberg‚Äôs mark gurman suggests that cook has no plans of stepping down in the near future.

Article Title: OpenAI CEO Sam Altman to employees in internal memo: Google‚Äôs AI success can create‚Ä¶
Article Text:
OpenAI CEO Sam Altman acknowledges Google's AI advancements, noting potential temporary economic challenges but expressing confidence in OpenAI's rapid progress. Despite concerns about slowing ChatGPT engagement, Altman remains optimistic about the company's long-term vision for superintelligence and its strategic partnerships, including one with Foxconn to bolster US AI infrastructure.

"create some temporary economic headwinds for our company."

"catching up fast"

What Sam Altman said OpenAI employees about the company‚Äôs biggest rivals

OpenAI's Master Plan for India

‚ÄúWe have built enough strength as a company to weather great models shipping elsewhere competition... (so), having most of our research team focused on really getting to superintelligence is critically important,‚Äù

‚ÄúIt s**ks that we have to do so many hard things at the same time ‚Äî the best research lab, the best AI infrastructure company, and the best AI platform/product company ‚Äî but such is our lot in life. And I wouldn't trade positions with any other company,‚Äù

‚ÄúThis partnership is a step toward ensuring the core technologies of the AI era are built here [US],‚Äù and added that AI infrastructure production presents a

‚Äúgenerational opportunity to reindustrialise America.‚Äù

"is uniquely positioned to support OpenAI‚Äôs mission with trusted, scalable infrastructure."

"Congrats to Google on Gemini 3! Looks like a great model," he said after the launch. Pichai replied with 'folded hands' emoji.





ChatGPT maker OpenAI 's CEO Sam Altman is optimistic about Google 's recent successes in artificial intelligence (AI) technology. In a recent internal memo to colleagues, Altman acknowledged that the AI startup rival's success couldHowever, Altman reassured that OpenAI isand anticipates emerging as the leader in the AI race. It's important to note that Altman's memo was written before Google's Gemini 3 was released, a model the tech giant has described as its most capable to date. Software developers have reported that the new model performed well on tasks such as automating website and product design and writing code, which is a lucrative revenue stream for OpenAI and its competitors, such as Anthropic.Concerns about OpenAI's slowing growth arose late this summer. During a recent quarterly earnings call with investors, the company‚Äôs CFO, Sarah Friar, confirmed that user engagement with the popular AI chatbot ChatGPT had cooled, despite the company's otherwise positive financial results.According to a report by The Information (as seen by The Economic Times), Sam Altman's memo noted that competitors such as Google and Anthropic are narrowing the gap in the AI raceAnthropic‚Äôs Claude model generates computer code for various tasks using conversational prompts.Meanwhile, Google has been integrating its Gemini AI chatbot into its search app, productivity tools and other services. However, recently, Claude gained a new challenger from OpenAI with the introduction of Codex.Google also holds an economic advantage. OpenAI‚Äôs growth has been rapid and the company now carries a valuation of around $500 billion as a for-profit entity. It is expected to bring in about $13 billion in revenue, but is estimated to burn roughly $100 billion in its push toward superintelligence.With a market value of about $3.5 trillion, Google reported free cash flow of over $70 billion in the past four quarters. A significant portion of this comes from providing cloud services to OpenAI, Anthropic and other competitors.Sam Altman also encouraged OpenAI employees to stay confident and focus on the company's larger goals.Altman wrote in the internal memo.Altman added.Recently, OpenAI partnered with Apple's biggest suuplier Foxconn to design and build AI data-centre components in the US. Under this partnership, OpenAI will help develop future server systems and may purchase Foxconn-produced hardware in the coming days. Altman noted that this collaboration can strengthen American manufacturing infrastructure.Commenting on the partnership, Altman said:Foxconn will join OpenAI‚Äôs supply chain to manufacture AI-related hardware in a more American way. The company, known for iPhone assembly, also manufactures AI servers and supplies components to Nvidia.Commenting on the partnership, Foxconn chairman Young Liu said that the companyIn September, Oracle also inked a $300 billion deal with ChatGPT maker OpenAI. Since then, the company has shed more than $300 billion in market value, and Wall Street is starting to wonder if a partnership between the companies will bring returns or pose risks for Oracle.
Article Summary: Openai ceo sam altman acknowledges google's ai advancements, noting potential temporary economic challenges but expressing confidence in openai's rapid progress. Despite concerns about slowing chatgpt engagement, altman remains optimistic about the company's long-term vision for superintelligence.

Article Title: Meet Jeet Karmakar: the Indian engineer helping young players get discovered through data
Article Text:
StepOut, led by Jeet Karmakar, uses AI to analyze match videos, improving youth athletes‚Äô performance/Image: Instagram

StepOut mission

From engineer to entrepreneur



StepOut‚Äôs technology and approach

Global reach and recognition





From engineering labs to the cutting edge of sports tech, Jeet Karmakar, the visionary co-founder of StepOut, is redefining how athletes train and get noticed. StepOut, a pioneering startup leveraging AI and machine learning to analyze player performance from match videos, is on a mission to democratize professional grade sports analytics. Speaking to ANI at the UAE-India Startup Series in Delhi, Karmakar shared the inspiring journey of StepOut and how it‚Äôs rapidly expanding its global footprint, helping young athletes worldwide bridge the gap between grassroots talent and elite scouting systems.At the recent UAE-India Startup Series event in Delhi, Jeet Karmakar, co-founder of StepOut, told ANI about the startup‚Äôs mission and milestones:"We majorly work with sports teams and help them improve their performance and identify the right talent. I think a lot of startups applied, and 500 were selected. Right now we are in the top 20, looking forward to being in the top five. It feels like a packed schedule for the next two days, with many events lined up. Apart from the pitch competition, it‚Äôs a great experience interacting with other founders."StepOut‚Äôs AI powered platform focuses on football but is designed to expand to other sports, democratizing access to professional level performance analysis.By combining computer vision, machine learning, and a SaaS delivery model, StepOut empowers clubs, coaches, and players globally to make data driven decisions and discover emerging talent.With its innovative technology, international partnerships, and a mission rooted in inclusivity, StepOut is redefining how youth sports performance is analyzed and showcased around the world.Jeet Karmakar, a computer science graduate from NIT Durgapur, began his tech career with over eight years of experience in product development, full stack engineering, and team leadership. He scaled platforms and teams at WorkIndia, progressing from early stage tech contributor to Engineering Manager.His passion for sports, rooted in his Kolkata upbringing and a personal love for cricket and football, combined with his tech expertise, inspired him to co-found StepOut. Even as a college student, Jeet built his first startup, demonstrating curiosity, scrappiness, and a belief in creating technology that is accessible, affordable, and impactful.At StepOut, Jeet focuses on technical development, product design, customer experience, and fundraising, while also contributing to business strategy and operational growth.StepOut transforms match videos into detailed, actionable insights using AI and machine learning. Its platform requires only a single video to generate comprehensive performance analysis, tracking every player and event on the field with 99% data accuracy.Key features include:Admin web app for coaches and analysts ‚Äì Offers performance dashboards and actionable insights.Mobile app for players ‚Äì Provides user-friendly summaries and recommendations.The technology automates the manual, time consuming work traditionally handled by coaches, saving teams up to 80% of their time. StepOut also allows young athletes to build data backed CVs, helping scouts identify hidden talent that might otherwise go unnoticed.StepOut has partnered with over 60 clubs and academies across 18 countries, analyzing more than 50,000 players worldwide. Notable partners include AFC Ajax, Rayo Vallecano, Apollon Limassol FC, and Bengaluru FC.The startup also became the first Asian company to win the UEFA Ajax Reimagine Football Innovation Challenge, showcasing its international recognition and pioneering role in sports tech. With a presence spanning Europe, the USA, Canada, the Middle East, India, Southeast Asia, and Australia, StepOut continues to expand its footprint.
Article Summary: Stepout, led by jeet karmakar, uses ai to analyze match videos, improving youth athletes‚Äô performance. Stepout has partnered with over 60 clubs and academies across 18 countries. Notable partners include afc ajax, rayo vallecano, apollon limassol fc, and bengaluru fc.

Article Title: Saudi Arabia: How to check your Ahlƒ´yah Social Security Number to get paid
Article Text:
Saudi Social Security ‚ÄúAhlƒ´yah‚Äù in seconds / AI Generated Image

Trump Sparks Global Fury With 'Things Happen' Defence of Saudi Crown Prince In Khashoggi Murder Case

What is ‚ÄúAhlƒ´yatuk‚Äù?

Funded by Zakat: Uniquely, the program‚Äôs funding comes primarily from Zakat, the mandatory Islamic charity, ensuring that the support is distributed to those determined to be truly deserving.

A Safety Net with a Ladder: Unlike old welfare systems, this new structure focuses on rehabilitation, training, and employment. The system categorizes beneficiaries and implements empowerment plans to help those able to work transition from reliance on aid to becoming productive contributors to the economy.

Key Timeline: The modern, enhanced program was introduced in 2022, marking a significant upgrade from the previous system.

Who gets the Golden Ticket?



Sign in to the official HRSD / Developed Social Security platform using National Single Sign-On (NaqƒÅz/Nafath).

Enter your national ID (or civil number), password and the captcha code.

Choose the Social Security (ÿßŸÑÿ∂ŸÖÿßŸÜ ÿßŸÑÿßÿ¨ÿ™ŸÖÿßÿπŸä) programme from the dashboard.

Click ‚ÄúEligibility and Entitlement‚Äù (ÿßŸÑÿ£ŸáŸÑŸäÿ© ŸàÿßŸÑÿßÿ≥ÿ™ÿ≠ŸÇÿßŸÇ) to display the current month‚Äôs status and the payment/benefit details.

Monthly disbursement schedule

What to do if your eligibility hasn‚Äôt appeared?

Not visible yet? If the eligibility option is missing, your application likely hasn‚Äôt been finalised. Wait until the eligibility-review window (completed by the 9th) closes.

Check carefully: Re-enter credentials and ensure you selected the correct programme page (ÿßŸÑÿ∂ŸÖÿßŸÜ ÿßŸÑÿßÿ¨ÿ™ŸÖÿßÿπŸä).

Still stuck: Contact HRSD through the official portal, the ministry‚Äôs support channels, or their verified social accounts for help. News outlets repeatedly advise avoiding rumours and relying only on the ministry‚Äôs official site for status and payment confirmation.





The Developed Social Security System (ÿßŸÑÿ∂ŸÖÿßŸÜ ÿßŸÑÿßÿ¨ÿ™ŸÖÿßÿπŸä ÿßŸÑŸÖÿ∑Ÿàÿ±), known locally as "Dhaman Al Ijtima'i Al Mutawwar," is the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia's core financial safety net. Overseen by the Ministry of Human Resources and Social Development (HRSD), this comprehensive program goes beyond simple aid by focusing on both immediate financial support and long-term empowerment.It aims to achieve the goals of Vision 2030 by ensuring that cash support reaches the most vulnerable while simultaneously transitioning recipients toward financial independence.‚ÄúAhlƒ´yatuk‚Äù refers to the eligibility result for the developed Social Security (ÿßŸÑÿ∂ŸÖÿßŸÜ ÿßŸÑÿßÿ¨ÿ™ŸÖÿßÿπŸä ÿßŸÑŸÖÿ∑ŸàŸëÿ±) program administered by Saudi Arabia‚Äôs Ministry of Human Resources and Social Development (HRSD). The eligibility check tells applicants whether their support request was approved for the current cycle or if further documentation is needed. This is the single monthly status beneficiaries watch to know if they will receive that month‚Äôs cash disbursement. The primary goal of the Developed Social Security program is to alleviate poverty and guarantee that eligible families and individuals secure a minimum monthly income for basic needs.Follow these exact steps to see your eligibility quickly:If the eligibility page or button does not appear, it usually means your application has not yet been processed, the Ministry says eligibility reviews are completed before the 9th of each Gregorian month.Applicants should wait until that window closes before checking again.HRSD has a fixed disbursement routine: approved beneficiaries generally receive their social security payment on the 1st day of each Gregorian month. For example, the news guidance confirms the December 2025 payment is scheduled for 1 December 2025; rumors of early payouts are false, the Ministry has said. Use the HRSD payments page to confirm the deposit date and transaction details.A clear, fast eligibility check reduces anxiety for applicants and cuts the spread of false claims about early payments or changed dates. Using the official HRSD platform and following the exact steps above ensures beneficiaries know their status accurately and can take corrective action if additional documentation is required.
Article Summary: ‚Äúahlƒ´yatuk‚Äù refers to the eligibility result for the developed social security program administered by saudi arabia‚Äôs ministry of human resources and social development (hrsd) the eligibility check tells applicants whether their support request was approved for the current cycle.

Article Title: Oman to test Laila, a pilotless hybrid electric VTOL aircraf
Article Text:
Laila, Odys Aviation‚Äôs pilotless hybrid-electric VTOL, flies 725 km carrying 60 kg, transforming Oman logistics/Reppresentative Image

Advanced aircraft





Wide ranging applications





Strategic impact









Oman is set to upgrade its aviation sector with a bold step into the future. The Sultanate will host Laila, a fully autonomous, hybrid-electric VTOL aircraft developed by California‚Äôs Odys Aviation, for its first Operational Launch Programme (OLP). The pilotless aircraft will take on real-world missions across deserts, mountains, and coastal regions, showcasing the potential of next-generation air mobility.Odys Aviation recently unveiled the full-scale pre-production prototype of Laila at its Long Beach facility. This pilotless VTOL aircraft features hybrid-electric propulsion, can travel roughly 450 miles (725 km), and carry payloads up to 130 pounds (60 kg). Once US testing concludes, Laila will be shipped to Oman for the OLP, a comprehensive programme designed to evaluate its technical performance, operational readiness, and integration with existing infrastructure.The OLP is a collaborative effort involving Oman‚Äôs Civil Aviation Authority (CAA) and the Ministry of Transport, Communications and Information Technology (MoTCIT). Signed last year, the agreement makes Oman the perfect testing ground for next-generation pilotless aircraft. Odys Aviation calls it the most thorough evaluation of its kind, putting every aspect of Laila‚Äôs hybrid electric capabilities to the testLaila‚Äôs autonomous capabilities, long range, and payload capacity make it versatile across commercial, civil, and defense sectors.In remote deserts and offshore oil fields, it can deliver essential tools, spare parts, and equipment in under three hours, compared to more than 36 hours by road. The aircraft can also monitor pipelines, ports, power plants, and other strategic infrastructure while transporting medical supplies and humanitarian aid to isolated communities in mountains, deserts, and coastal regions.Laila operates without runways or extensive infrastructure, allowing flexible point-to-point transport across Oman‚Äôs diverse and rugged landscapes. Its deployment aligns with Oman Vision 2040, enhancing national connectivity, accelerating logistics, and supporting sustainable regional development. Emergency and civil defense services stand to benefit from rapid-response capabilities, while the programme signals Oman‚Äôs readiness to lead in next-generation aviation technology.Odys Aviation highlighted that Oman was the natural first choice for the OLP and intends to expand the programme worldwide. The completion of Laila‚Äôs prototype represents a historic step toward operational pilotless air mobility on a global scale.
Article Summary: Laila, odys aviation‚Äôs pilotless hybrid-electric vtol, flies 725 km carrying 60 kg, transforming oman logistics. The pilotless aircraft will take on real-world missions across deserts, mountains, and coastal regions. Its deployment aligns with oman vision 2040, enhancing national connectivity, accelerating logistics.
